scripts.all:start: concurrently "cd _gateway && npm run start:dev" "cd admin && npm run start:dev" "cd communication && npm run start:dev" "cd diagnosis && npm run start:dev" "cd user_management && npm run start:dev"
scripts.docker:build: concurrently "cd _gateway && docker compose up" "cd admin && docker compose up" "cd communication && docker compose up" "cd diagnosis && docker compose up" "cd user_management && docker compose up"
